channel.title: Methodology on Vultursec | Security in your hand
channel.description: Recent content in Methodology on Vultursec | Security in your hand

item.title: VulturSec Cloud Methodology
item.description: Cloud security assessments test the security on another level that usually would not be directly evaluated during a traditional external network assessment or pentest because traditional security and clouds infrastructure differs on multiple ways.

item.title: VulturSec Mobile Methodology
item.description: Mobile penetration testing is different than traditional penetration testing, just like mobile applications are different than traditional ones.

item.title: VulturSec Red Team Methodology
item.description: Red Team Assessments are highly precise assessments that target to compromise critical assets in our customers network, with any possible technique available.

item.title: VulturSec SDLC Methodology
item.description: A long time ago security was a desired aspect on any application, sometimes it was seen as an optional feature as it was thought that it didn’t add any value to the product.

item.title: VulturSec Web Methodology
item.description: Web applications are the core of todayâ€™s software. From webapps in highly scalable AWS environments with multiple microservices running to legacy apps in more traditional infrastructures, the VulturSec team helped secure data across the world.
